name: Reasonable Doubt
description:
Early Beta.

Press 'M' to Mute.

Press 'P' to Pause.

Only about 3% of the story has been written. Much, much more to come!

If you want to influence the story, comment your ideas down below or send them to me on Discord @ AquaduckStudio#0780

Thanks for playing. Come back on October 1st!
